test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document as bug)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that EOS transaction can be edited (gratuity and leave encashment amounts modified) and resubmitted without 'something went wrong' error
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS transaction editing and submission
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees; check for error messages and form state after submission attempts
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap field in accrual report displays and is labeled correctly for Gross salary vs Basic salary calculation basis
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify month labels are clearly displayed on gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity export file column headers align correctly with data content (hire date, employee name, amounts, etc.)
Verify Gratuity Report includes customizable fields, filtering options, and displays all required information fields (extra data columns)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message displays when employee lacks salary configuration and that message is clear about prerequisites
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column not included in sum)
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly in downloaded report
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form for Qatar clients; check if description references correct country labor law
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Locate and select employee from table
Enter departure date in date picker
Add or modify deductions if needed
System calculates and displays gratuity amount
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: Input computation date for gratuity calculation
Download gratuity file with all employee liabilities
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify that End of Service transactions can be submitted and edited without encountering generic error messages; confirm error handling provides clear feedback
Verify End of Services tab visibility state changes based on employee offboarding status in employee profile

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS Report and Form UI Elements
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify EOS-related UI elements (report column labels, form fields, error messages) are properly displayed and interactive in gratuity accrual reports and EOS transaction forms
Backend calculation verification - Cannot be tested with Playwright as these require mathematical formula validation and business logic verification
Verify gratuity file export interface displays correct month labels and column headers align with data content in exported files
Verify Gratuity Report UI displays all required fields, shows clear error messages for missing configurations, and supports customization options
Verify gratuity export files and custom payroll reports include correct columns (Employee ID, Office), calculate totals accurately, and display gratuity fields properly

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS form field visibility and interaction
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Test EOS form submission flow: navigate to employee EOS, verify all form fields display correctly (departure date, reason, contract type), verify error messages appear when validation fails, verify country-specific text displays appropriately

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - ticket cancelled, no implementation to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test. Also involves backend calculation logic verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test. System constraint is by design

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Closed status - feature request already addressed or rejected. Report data accuracy is backend calculation
Closed status - support question about configuration, not a testable bug or feature
Closed status - calculation accuracy is backend logic, not UI testable. Date arithmetic verification requires backend validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service giving error: Something went wrong
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed. Generic error handling improvement is backend concern
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of gratuity formulas

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved; bug has been fixed. No current UI state to test
Requires backend functionality to reverse/reopen finalized settlements; cannot test if feature was implemented or verify calculation reversal logic
Status is Pending; requires verification of tenure calculation accuracy against MOHRE records, which is backend calculation validation
Requires validation of gratuity calculation correctness; Playwright cannot verify if calculation formula produces correct numerical results
Status is Cancelled; ticket was cancelled and no longer requires testing
Status is Pending; requires validation of calculation logic for mid-month departures and unpaid leave adjustments, which is backend calculation
Resolved bug - calculation discrepancy between system and manual values (AED 231,821 vs AED 252,485) is a backend calculation issue, not a UI problem to test now
Resolved bug - backend logic for differentiating payslip vs EOS settlement letter generation; cannot verify document generation accuracy with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - backend calculation logic for tracking GOSI deductions; cannot test calculation correctness with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - backend calculation of report balances across payroll cycles; cannot verify mathematical accuracy with Playwright
Closed bug - backend recalculation logic when employee profile changes; cannot test data consistency with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - backend calculation methodology for leap year handling; cannot verify calculation correctness with Playwright
Resolved bug - backend alignment with 2021 UAE Labor Law for contract type handling; cannot test calculation logic with Playwright
Resolved support ticket - backend calculation methodology discrepancy (AED 6,998.25 expected vs actual); cannot verify calculation accuracy with Playwright
Resolved support ticket - backend question about leap year handling in calculations; cannot test calculation logic with Playwright
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding - Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of accrual formulas
Backend gratuity calculation logic verification - Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of gratuity amounts or compare against manual calculations
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees - Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of department-specific gratuity formulas
Backend calculation and date selection logic - Playwright cannot verify historical gratuity amounts or validate past month calculations
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation - Playwright cannot verify mathematical formula differences or UAE labor law compliance

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - requires database verification and payroll transaction history validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - requires verification of mathematical formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy
Backend calculation logic - requires verification of inclusive date calculation methodology and comparison with external calculators

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - requires verification of pro-rated salary deduction formula for mid-month departures
Backend calculation bug - requires verification of month-counting logic and leave days formula accuracy
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splits SIF file generation based on arrears logic; cannot test file generation or backend splitting logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules - requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization checks; Playwright cannot verify data accuracy across multiple system views
Documentation/help article clarification request - not a testable UI bug; resolved as documentation update

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend gratuity calculation logic error - mathematical formula produces different amounts based on departure reason; cannot test calculation correctness with Playwright
Backend calculation issue with unpaid leave handling in gratuity formula; cannot verify mathematical correctness of calculations with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation issue - service duration calculation logic error; cannot verify mathematical accuracy of date calculations with Playwright

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
